synopsis.text: These short musical films, titled "Clamp in Wonderland," present a vibrant array of beloved characters from the renowned mangaka group, CLAMP. The videos feature a diverse cast of characters from popular series such as "X" and "Magic Knight Rayearth," showcasing their unique worlds filled with bravery, beauty, and compassion. The accompanying song immerses viewers in a fantastical wonderland brimming with magic and dreams. From high school students turned legendary Magic Knights to a young girl navigating a mysterious Wonderland, and a group of friends battling an evil warlord, these characters embark on extraordinary journeys to make their worlds a better place. With over 100 characters spanning CLAMP's extensive canon, "Clamp in Wonderland" is a celebration of their remarkable creations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
